description.content: New items have been added from the latest Granblue Fantasy update.
description.feature: Now you can remix other people's teams, add Character rings and earrings, set Shields and Manatura on parties, and more!

title: Roadmap
subtitle: Next update
blurb: I'm aiming for this update to release between late-January and early-February. I'm losing a week to top 2k in Guild Wars and after that I'm back at my full-time job, so progress will be a bit slower.

link.intro: You can see the full roadmap on Github below:
link.title: granblue.team Roadmap

item1.title: Remix teams
item1.description: See a team you want to riff off of? This update will let you remix other teams, which will add a copy to your account to make something new.

item2.title: Character mods
item2.description: This update will allow you to add rings, earrings, perpetuity rings and awakenings to your characters.

item3.title: Remove from grid
item3.description: This update will allow you to remove characters, summons, or weapons from your grid.

item4.title: Transcendence
item4.description: This update will allow you to set which transcendence stage characters or summons in your team are at.

item5.title: URL state for team tabs
item5.description: This update will allow you to append /characters, /weapons, /summons to link to individual tabs, and also /all to see everything at once.

item6.title: Add R characters
item6.description: I will spend several hours manually inputting R characters, just for you.

item7.title: Private and unlisted teams
item7.description: If you just want to save something for yourself, this update will let you change the visibility of teams so only you or people you share the link with can see them.
